content:
Is there any guidance which specifies major FHIR implementations/APIs and the FHIR versions supported?
This would be helpful in determining the trade-offs in adopting various versions and the feasibility of interoperability with different systems.

For instance, suppose I want to implement a CDS Hook which run HEDIS CQL compliance algorithms, then launches a smart app which connects to CMS Bluebutton and Apple health kit.
(That might not be a valid scenario, but for illustrative purposes).
To begin to evaluate that I need to understand which versions of FHIR are supported by the various entities/libraries/etc. involved.

Do we have a community wiki of any sort for this?
